value.name: Napa County working with winter shelter residents to find 'housing opportunities'
value.description: Brandon Gardner, homeless outreach specialist for the Napa Police Department, told the Register in late April that between “40 to 45 people” have stayed at the Expo overnight during the pandemic.

value.name: Full List of 229 Black People Killed by Police Since George Floyd's Murder
value.description: U.S. George Floyd Police Killings Police brutality Black Lives Matter At least 229 Black people have been killed by police officers across the U.S. in the year since George Floyd's murder.
